dcterms:description: MIMICS is a collection of search clarification datasets for real search queries sampled from the Bing query logs, containing three subsets: MIMICS-Click, MIMICS-ClickExplore, and MIMICS-Manual. It provides up to 5 ground-truth facets and at most 10 associated documents for each search query.
dcterms:title: MIMICS
